title: My system storage is at 20GB. How can I reduce this without factory resetting? (Pixel 3 64GB)
content:
My system storage is at 20GB. How can I reduce this without factory resetting? (Pixel 3 64GB)
I have used the "free up space" button and I am continuously removing cache and storage of other apps, however this  only helps temporarily. The system storage does not budge from 20GB and this seems to be more than it should be. Any help would be appreciated!
